mapper.select: select agevalue from gage where agekey =#{agekey}
select dcategoryname from gcategory where dcategorykey =#{categorykey}
select scategoryname from gcategory2 where dcategorykey =#{categorykey}
select groupnickname from ggroupmember where userkey = (select userkey from ggroup where groupkey =#{groupkey})
select * from ggroupboard where groupkey = #{groupkey} order by boardseq
select userimagefile, groupnickname from gusers left join GGROUPMEMBER using(userkey) where groupkey=#{groupkey} and usergrade in(0,1)
select postkey,posttitle,postdate,userkey,groupkey,boardkey,cstartdate,cenddate,cmoney,maxperson,location from post left join calendar using(postkey) where groupkey=#{groupkey} and usergrade in(0,1)
